name: Rockbots
description:
Mine, Build, FIGHT!

A 2 to 4-player arena game where you mine for resources and parts, assemble said parts into your own custom designed Rockbot, and fight your friends (or enemies) with it!

Made By
Skye Mohlin

Assets not made during the jam:
All SFX are from Soundly's libraries.

All Music is from Epidemic Sound.
